headline: ADP AUTHORIZED TO PURCHASE $6 BILLION OF ITS COMMON STOCK
summary: Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADP), a global leader in HR and payroll solutions, announced today that the ADP Board of Directors authorized the purchase of $6 billion of its common stock.

headline: ADP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: The board of directors of Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADP) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.70 per share payable April 1, 2026 to shareholders of record on March 13, 2026.

headline: Automatic Data Processing Gets $6B Stock Buyback Authorization
summary: Automatic Data Processing Gets $6B Stock Buyback Authorization
